skill.name: behaviors.skills.MakeFollow
skill.description: To order a set of given units (teammates) to follow agent. The agent acts on each unit by following the order of the units into the 'units' list. A unit won't follow if it cannot perform the mission (mission is not set for this type of unit).

parameter.name: units
parameter.description: The units to make follow me.

link.name: reach
link.description: To reach each unit and ask to follow.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all temmate units have been visited, even if once of them couldn't follow.
